sentences.sentence: But, as long as your reinterpretations of what others might consider flaws are positive, then unrealistic beliefs can be very good for your relationship.
sentences.translation: 但只要你能把对方的缺陷当作积极的一面看待，那么不真实的看法会对你们的关系非常有益。

sentences.sentence: And zombies have clawed their way to the top of book best-seller lists in the last decade with literature ranging from how-to survival manuals to reinterpretations of early Victorian fiction.
sentences.translation: 在过去十年间，各种有关僵尸题材的书籍——从生存手册到早期维多利亚小说的重新解读——无不跻身于各畅销书排行榜之首。
